q1.question: Is AI Chat really free?
q1.answer: Yes! We offer 4 completely free AI models: Gemini Flash-Lite, Llama 3.3, DeepSeek V3, and Qwen 2.5. These models have no usage limits and are perfect for everyday tasks.

q2.question: How does pay-per-use pricing work?
q2.answer: You only pay for the tokens you use with premium models. Buy credits when you need them - no monthly subscription, no hidden fees. Track your usage in real-time.

q3.question: Which AI model should I choose?
q3.answer: For most tasks, free models work great. For complex coding, try GPT-5.2 or Claude Opus 4.5. For reasoning tasks, DeepSeek R1 excels. For creative writing, try Claude models.

q4.question: Can I upload images and files?
q4.answer: Yes! You can upload images, PDFs, and text files. AI will analyze the content and answer your questions about it. This works with most models.

q5.question: Is my data private?
q5.answer: Absolutely. We don't train models on your conversations. Your chat history is encrypted and only accessible by you. You can delete your data at any time.
